response.original_title: Quando a Hora me Devora e Eu só Penso em ir Embora
response.overview: Rewatching and re-editing the short film "Seus Dias Pelo Progresso", director Lucas Pereira creates an atmosphere of reflection and dissatisfaction with the days we spend almost locked inside offices in our major cities. The film features the addition of the track "2021: Essa Megera Insaciável" to the original soundtrack mix, imbuing the images with a new rhythm and adding meaning to the proposed dialogue. Featuring visual and auditory experimentation, metalanguage, and poetry, the short film aims to intensify the struggle for individual freedom, whether literal or simply a feeling.
response.tagline: Rewatching and re-editing the short film "Seus Dias Pelo Progresso"
response.title: When Time Devours Me and I Only Think About Leaving
